name: cd
title: change directory
description: Change the current directory to DIR. The default DIR is the value of the HOME shell variable.

sections.title: DESCRIPTION
sections.content: Change the shell working directory. Change the current directory to DIR. The default DIR is the value of the HOME shell variable.

sections.title: OPTIONS
sections.content:
-L
    force symbolic links to be followed

-P
    use the physical directory structure without following symbolic links

searchContent: cd change directory navigation folder path home
